titleStmt.title: The lives & deaths of most of those eminent persons who by their virtue and valour obtained the sirnames of Magni,or the Great whereof divers of them give much light to the understanding of the prophecies in Esay, Jeremiah, Ezekiel, and Daniel, concerning the three first monarchies : and to other Scriptures concerning the captivity, and restauration of the Jews / by Samuel Clark ...
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for W.B. and are to be sold by Tho. Sawbridge ... and by W. Birch ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
